rComments: She was very upbeat and positive in her classes. I found her feedback to be very helpful, but she still gave a great deal of freedom with the drafts. One thing that really impressed me was that while she did make her political opinions quite clear, she was incredibly respectful to others who disagreed, rather than expecting indoctrination. 10/10

I loved this class, and it was because Ms. Foster was an excellent professor. She always helped me, and I saw her helping other students too if we had trouble. We talked things over in groups, which helped. In class, we did fun work with the books we read, and watched interesting films. I felt Ms. Foster wanted everyone to understand the class.

Best writing 2 prof ever! Really easy! Get her if you can. Papers are really short compared to other writing 2 classes. And you can get references from library instead of buying the book. She shows movies and you write essays based on the movies. Best and nicest professor ever! Easy A!

Most boring class I've taken so far at UCSC! She shows movies that literally make you fall asleep, and when doing work in class everyone just sits around staring at the clock. This class didn't help me with my writing and it was a total snooze! Skip this class and prof if you can!
Maureen is awesome! ecocriticism was so easy, one midterm (easy!), one project about a film, and a short paper for the final. we watched a ton of movies. Definitely recommend her!

Even though I would agree with everyone that this class is easy, I still believe that it was no less educational than any other core class. I found that my writing skills improved greatly from this class. I took the styles of writing I learned and went on to get As and beyond for other essays in other classes. Take Maureen's class!!

Great teacher! very clear on what she wants from you, to the point and very helpful, will make sure you get to where she wants you to be. your grade is based on the grade of the final paper, which is easy to ace because she has you write a few before so you have room to improve. Hope to be able to get her for writing 2!
I kind of got the feeling that this was one of the easier Writing 2 classes. She only required one paper that was over five pages long. Most papers were only 2 pages.

i had foster for porter core last year, and then took her dystopia and futurism writing 2. i loved her! she is very clear on what she expects of you and grades you based on your own improvement, not against others in the class. she's really supportive and interesting.for her W2, you basically watch movies and discuss books. if you can get in, DO IT
She was clear, friendly, and very helpful.  Also she encouraged discussion which not only made her classes more interesting but it kept you engaged.  I would recommend her!
Maureen is great. I love her little stories and we always were able to discuss freely in her class about our opinions on a topic. Her class is awesome.

Easy class. She definitely made it more interesting. Easiest Porter Core from what I could tell. Even so, I still felt like I learned a lot by the end of the quarter. She honestly cares about her students and is a big help.
i really enjoyed porter core.  foster was great, she helped improve my writing, made the assignments interesting, was really laid back and genuinely cared about her students.
